EmailTemplate.name: SF Global Support Case Submission Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been submitted
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks so much for reaching out!
Your request has been received and assigned case number-{!Case.CaseNumber}. Please DO NOT respond to this email. You will receive a separate notification with the name of the individual working your case and any comments or concerns can be addressed in that email.
Please allow 1-2 business days for our team to review your case and respond
We look forward to chatting soon!
Salesforce Administrator Team NCR Corporation salesforce.administration@ncr.com
NCR Confidential. FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY. NCR Corporation 864 Spring St. NW, Atlanta, GA 30308-1007 Â©2020 NCR Corporation. All rights reserved. ncr.com NCR respects your privacy.
